primary: I have 8 years of experience in the tech sector. That includes several years as a writer/marketer and more recently as a self-taught developer specializing in building fullstack web apps utilitizing Angular.js, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. My goal is to combine elegant front-end design with fast and efficient back ends to deliver exceptional user experiences.
secondary: In addition to the MEAN stack, I'm proficient in HTML, CSS, and Javascript, as well as jQuery and Bootsrap. I also have have excellent communication skills and experience with Agile development.
